mapper.sql: system_user.id, system_user.name, system_user.password, system_user.user_name, system_user.en_user_name, system_user.phone, system_user.department_id, system_user.work_id, system_user.company_id, system_user.superior_id, system_user.audit_status, system_user.status, system_user.login_time, system_user.note
mapper.select: SELECT su.id, su.user_name userName, su.en_user_name enUserName, su.phone, w.`work_name` workName, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM `system_user` t WHERE t.`department_id` = su.`department_id` AND t.`is_department_charge` = '0') countUser FROM `system_user` su LEFT JOIN `work` w ON su.`work_id` = w.`id` WHERE su.`department_id` = #{departmentId} AND su.`is_department_charge` = '1'
SELECT su.id, su.user_name userName FROM `system_user` su WHERE su.`role_id` = #{roleId}

SELECT su.id, su.`name`, su.user_name userName, su.`en_user_name` enUserName, su.`department_id` departmentId, d.`name` departmentName, su.`work_id` workId, w.`work_name` workName, sr.`id` roleId, sr.`name` roleName, (SELECT c.company_name FROM company c WHERE c.id = su.`company_id`) companyName, su.`company_id` companyId, su.`superior_id` superiorId, (SELECT t.user_name FROM `system_user` t WHERE t.id = su.`superior_id`) superiorName, su.`phone`, su.`email`, su.`is_department_charge` isDepartmentCharge FROM `system_user` su LEFT JOIN department d ON su.`department_id` = d.`id` LEFT JOIN `work` w ON su.`work_id` = w.`id` LEFT JOIN system_user_role_relation surr ON su.`id` = surr.`user_id` LEFT JOIN system_role sr ON sr.`id` = surr.`role_id` WHERE su.`id` = #{id}
